item-margin-bottom.description: Sets the form items margin bottom.

nowrap.description: Force the <label> text to stay on a single line and ellipse the overflow text.

label-top-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a top vertical-aligned label.

label-right-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a right text-aligned label.

label-top-right-aligned.description: Styles the form item with a top vertical-aligned and right text-aligned label.

label-width.description: Sets the horizontal form items' label width.

label-margin-right.description: Sets the horizontal form items' label margin right.

label-margin-bottom.description: Sets the vertical form items' label margin bottom.
